sentences.en: He has the appearance of a rustic fellow.

sentences.en: It was nearly seven months of leisurely rustic living before Michael felt real boredom.

sentences.en: She was more rustic in her effort to appear urban.

sentences.en: Their outriders were boys in rustic costumes who lit the darkness with fantastic torches.

sentences.en: When he came to decorate the kitchen, Kenneth opted for a friendly rustic look.
sentences.cn: 装修厨房的时候，肯尼思选择的是一种亲切质朴的田园风格。

words.tran_cn: 质朴；乡村式；田园生活；乡气

trans.tran_cn: 乡村的，乡下的，质朴的，朴素的，粗鲁的，圆木造的
trans.tran_en: simple, old-fashioned, and not spoiled by modern developments, in a way that is typical of the countryside
someone from the country, especially a farm worker
